{{short description|2021 Mythopoeic Society conference}}
{{convention|image=|title=Mythcon 51|location=Held online|organizer=[[Mythopoeic Society]]|dates=31 July - 1 August [[2021]]|attendees=|previous=[[Mythcon 50]]|next=[[Mythcon 52]]}}'''Mythcon 51''' was the fifty-first annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. No Mythcon was held in 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic and Mythcon 51 was the first entirely virtual Mython conference.

*'''Theme:''' "A Virtual "Halfling" Mythcon"
